title: The Good Man trailer
description:
Trailer for the Manifesto Films production, The Good Man, now available in UK/Ireland/US/Canada/Australia/New Zealand on iTunes (https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/the-good-man/id873130906) and DVD (http://www.amazon.co.uk/The-Good-Man-Aiden-Gillen/dp/B00IIK6CGU/). Co-production with Jet Black Entertainment (South Africa). Starring Aidan Gillen, Thabang Sidloyi, Kelly Campbell, Lunathi Mampofu. Written & directed by Phil Harrison. More info at www.thegoodmanfilm.com

Check out the Variety Magazine review here: http://www.variety.com/review/VE1117947909/
tags: belfast, cape town, africa, ireland, film
